title: Can I get RP in the NA Server using Prepaid Cards from México?

replies.body: Those RP cards are tied to the region that you buy them in. Cards bought in Mexico will only work on the Latin America server. You'll be able to find other ways of getting RP by looking over our [**payment methods**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203701590) article.
